name: The Witch's Tower
description:
Defend your home from invading creatures!

Move with arrow keys or WASD. Press space to pick up and move your turrets (you can't build turrets while carrying a turret).

Turrets fire when the orb inside them hits a loop! Build your turrets in strategic positions to maximize damage!

**If the loops seem to bug out, or the orb disappears, pick up a turret that's part of the loop and place it again; that'll reset the orb positions and (hopefully) fix the loops.

Made by Jasmine Zhang and Titilope Akinnitire in 72 hours for Ludum Dare 47: Stuck in a Loop.
